text: Wǒ jiāng xiāochú tāmen [lèyuán de jūmín] xīnzhōng [bǐcǐ jiān kěnéng cúnzài] de yuànhèn,[tāmen jiāng zhù zài] zhū héliúguò de lèyuán. Tāmen jiāng shuō:“Yīqiè zànsòng, quán guī ān lā, shì tā yǐndǎo wǒmen huò cǐ shàn bào de. Jiǎrú ān lā bù yǐndǎo wǒmen, nàme, wǒmen bù kěnéng zūnxíng zhèngdào. Wǒmen de zhǔ de shǐzhěmen què yǐ dài lái zhēnlǐ.” Tāmen jiāng tīngjiàn dàshēng zhàohuàn:“Zhè jiùshì nǐmen yīn nǐmen suǒ zuò de shàngōng [zhù] ér jìchéng de lèyuán.”
